## HW 40.10

| Parameter                         | Value                                                                       |
| --------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| MCU                               | [Artery AT32F403ARCT7](https://www.arterychip.com/en/product/AT32F403A.jsp) |
| Firmware base address             | 0x8002000                                                                   |
| Unique printer ID segment address | 0x803f000                                                                   |
| Firmware file offset              | 0                                                                           |
